title: The Death of The Critic: Barthes’ Royal Treatment in "Pale Fire"

history.message:
Hi Domenic,

Thank you for your interest in The Decadent Review. We have received your submission and look forward to reviewing it.

Thanks!
-The Decadent Review

Dear Domenic,

Thank you for this interesting essay, we'd like to publish it in The Decadent Review, following some editorial process.

We'll contact you further via email, as registered on Submittable (and sometimes those get to the junk folder, so double check that).

It may take a little while, as we're working through the queue, so please allow some patience.


Thank you and health above all, yours,


D.

Dear Domenic Cregan,

Congratulations! This message confirms the acceptance of your submission to The Decadent Review.

Thanks again.
Sincerely,
Dimitri Kaufman
The Decadent Review
No email response sent to submitter.
